text:
Sawaddee ka, welcome to hot thai kitchen so today 
i'm going to share with you an authentic thai

coconut ice cream recipe that is exactly like you 
would get on the streets of thailand and so much

better than anything you can buy at the store i 
guarantee it only uses four simple ingredients

and i'll also show you how you can serve it street 
style so that you can practically have thai street

food right at home let's get started we're gonna 
make our ice cream mix right on the stove top

starting with palm sugar now go watch my video 
on palm sugar 101 so you know how to choose good

quality palm sugar this is the main ingredient so 
it does make a difference if you use good one or

not good one okay and then coconut milk also go 
watch my video on how to choose a good coconut

milk this is especially important if you use not 
good quality coconut milk here doesn't matter what

you do it's not going to taste good i will link 
to all that in the description below i'm going to

lighten it a bit with some coconut water now this 
is only a little bit of coconut water because i

want to keep it rich and creamy but if you prefer 
something light and sorbet-esque for the summer

check out my first coconut ice cream recipe 
i'll link to that in the description as well

and then just a little bit of salt to balance the 
sugar it's very very important now this is all the

mandatory stuff if you want if you can get it you 
want to add some pandan leaves as well so pandan

leaves are basically our vanilla it's used to 
infuse floral aroma to our desserts it'll just add

complexity to our ice cream if you're not using 
the pandan leaf just heat it up until the sugar

dissolved kill the heat you're done but if you are 
adding pandan leaves i would bring it to a simmer

just so that the pandan has some time to extract 
its flavor into the solution and that's it how

simple is that this is all you need but all 
the ingredients have to be good okay so that

is simmering i'm gonna turn it off now if you want 
you can give this a taste and decide if you want

it a little more sweet or less sweet keeping 
in mind that when ice cream mixtures are hot

it's a little bit sweeter 
than it will be when it's cold

oh i can just drink that who needs who needs ice 
cream anymore just give me a bowl of that i don't

even know why i tasted that i've made this so many 
times i know it's good okay so now this needs to

completely chill before you churn it so this is 
definitely something you want to plan in advance

ice cream time now i got myself a 
self-refrigerating machine this year

because i want to make a lot of ice cream but this 
recipe will work with any machine but you do need

a machine so i'll link to a couple of options 
with different budgets below and not much to

talk about here you pour it in you turn it 
on you follow your machine's instructions
and take out the pandan leaves obviously

while this is going if you want to serve it thai 
street style you also want to make a sweet coconut

sticky rice to go with it very simple all you 
do is make a syrup with coconut milk sugar and

salt cook it until all the sugar is dissolved 
and then pour that syrup over some freshly

steamed sticky rice give it a good stir let that 
rest for 40 minutes and stir it halfway through

and that's it and now you have that for the ice 
cream or for mango and sticky rice all right

so white and creamy you can have it 
straight out of the machine and it'll be

like a soft serve consistency but if you want 
it firmer like ice cream this needs to freeze

for another couple hours 
at least i would recommend

pre-freezing whatever container you're going 
to use wide and flat is better so things will

freeze faster and when ice cream feast freezes 
quickly it will be creamier and less spicy
look at this

the hardest thing is getting everything 
out but you know what you don't have to get

everything out you can just eat whatever 
didn't come out right now dairy free

vegan vegetarian it fits all the bills okay i'm 
gonna just pop this into the freezer real quick

and then i'll show you how to serve it 
street style time to assemble now you

can have the ice cream asses of course but 
if you want the real street food experience

you need a couple more things and this is even 
hard to find in thailand today this is like

old school when i was growing up kind of style 
okay so we got our sticky rice ready to go now

hot dog buns yes instead of cup or cone we have 
cup or bun the north american side is a little bit

big so i'm just going to trim top and bottom you 
can cut it in half but you know this is a prettier

shape and then just because this bun is not as 
fluffy as i'd like i want to remove the inside

a little bit to make more room for the ice cream 
the asian buns are so fluffy that it compresses

a lot fill it with some sweet coconut sticky rice 
which by the way freezes really well i'll share

more about how to freeze this in the website 
on the recipe post and then let me get out the

ice cream so this is still a little soft but 
we're in a rush here wow so smooth so creamy

super soft oh my god this looks like 
childhood already absolutely mandatory if

you're not allergic it's roasted peanuts it will 
really add to the whole experience is texture

nuttiness you can substitute roasted cashews 
or whatever kind of nuts and seeds you can have

there are many many topping options 
but corn is a really simple one that

you don't have to make and it's easy to find 
and it's delicious yay that's it and now the

real challenge is how to eat this gracefully 
which there is no way to eat this gracefully

oh my god like i'm getting emotional with 
like memories because even when every time

i go to thailand this is hard to 
find like i'm always looking for

this authentic style with nothing in the ice 
cream no dairy no milk just pure coconut flavor

sticky rice i would say that's a must-have i 
would say if you can choose between the buns and

the sticky rice go with the sticky rice texture 
like mochi ice cream you know how good that is

same idea so good so i hope you give this a try 
the recipe as always will be on HotThaiKitchen.com

it is so easy so simple i'll give you all 
the details to make sure you are successful

on the website in the recipe post a special 
thanks to our patreon supporters who help

support the show and if you want to watch 
my videos ad free and get bonus content

with every episode you can check out what 
patreon is all about i'll link to that below

thank you as always for watching and i will see 
you next time for your next delicious Thai meal
